price: Among His signs is that He created you from dust, then you became human beings spreading [on the earth].
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنۡ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ إِذَآ أَنتُم بَشَرٞ تَنتَشِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
